document_data.name: Rearing Merdragon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rearing Merdragon''' was a club in [[Suzail]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Interior: There was more than one table at the club's most expensive and overpriced room.
document_data.History: In the lead-up to the [[Council of the Dragon]] in the late {{yearlinkName|1479}} the [[vampire]] [[archmage]] [[Manshoon]] mind-controlled Lord [[Melder Crownrood]] while the latter was eating at the club's most expensive and overpriced room.
document_data.Services: To Manshoon's knowledge, pets were not allowed. Meals included skewered roast [[quail]].
document_data.Reputation: The place numbered among the most overpriced and haughtiest in the city.
